org.ajgl.collision

Class AABB

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ajgl.primary.Drawable
      • org.ajgl.collision.AABB
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Collidable, ConvexPolygon, Polygon

    public class AABB
extends Drawable
implements Collidable
    This class is designed to be a Bounding box.
    Author:
    Tyler Bucher
